meanings.definition: The lines marking the sides of a playing field in sports such as soccer or rugby.
meanings.sent1: Players must stay within the touchlines during the game.
meanings.sent2: The ball rolled out of bounds beyond the touchlines.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel ran along the touchlines, pretending to be a referee.
meanings.sent4: The trees along the touchlines whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The bright paint on the touchlines made them easy to see from afar.
